message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to you, just like it does to me. This product is worth $800,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you at a special price tailored to our mutual interests. Considering its significance and the effort put into its creation, I propose to sell it to you for $750,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my desire to see this product in capable hands that appreciate its true worth. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
